## Pre-Merge Checklist

- [ ] Pull request targets the `develop` branch
- [ ] `npm test` has been run and passes
- [ ] Examples have been reviewed
- [ ] Commit message follows [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/)
- [ ] CI is green
